name: OR_LNLG_COUNTS_RETAIN_ITM
description: The OR_LNLG_COUNTS_RETAIN_ITM table contains information about whether the retained item alert was implemented.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: COUNT_RETAINED_ITEM_ALERT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value for whether the retained item alert was implemented.
